snippet.title: Brazen Blaze - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Brazen Blaze is a 3v3 VR arena hero shooter developed by MyDearest Inc. Embody a Runner and utilize skills and abilities to gain the upper-hand in close-quarters matches for the ultimate victory. Brazen Blaze is launching on July 18 for SteamVR and Meta Quest.
